entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
